profile:
Excellent flooring installations, for good prices.
We do professional flooring installations, and we're really good at it. 
We do it all from A to Z, helping you take easy decisions over questions like: 
"Which flooring is best?", "Which flooring is cheapest?", "What flooring should I choose for my bedroom?", or "Where do I buy my floorings from?". 
Never wonder again.

WHY CHOOSE US
There are many reasons to choose us over competitors, here are a couple.

HIGH QUALITY WORK
With us, you don't have to worry about the results. We give you quality work and quality work only.

FAST RESULTS
We appreciate your time and we know that your schedule is busy. We work as fast as we can without affecting work quality.

GOOD PRICES
Our prices are good and we are cheaper than many of our competition.

We can make your flooring shine
Whether it's laminate flooring, hardwood flooring, vinyl flooring, tile flooring, or luxury vinyl flooring, we install it and make your floor astonishing.
Installing a new flooring is one of the best mediums for home improvement.

Our Professional Process
1.CONSULTANCY
You're not on your own and you will never be. 
We assess your flooring situation to determine the best solutions for the best prices, and put you in the right direction to take a decision.

2. PLANNING & INSPECTION
We give you a friendly visit to inspect your flooring and assess your complete situation. 
We will then create the best plan that suits you and define the best flooring type to use.

3. GETTING MATERIALS
We can get the materials ourselves, or you can simply take a tour and get what you need. 
Don't know where to begin? We will guide you to quality stores with best prices. 
We got you covered, whether it's vinyl flooring, laminate flooring, hardwood flooring, tile flooring or even planks.

4. IMPLEMENTATION
Once the materials are available, we start our installing your flooring working our way into making it look as best as possible.

For any enquiries contact Mo - 902-414-7652
info@iandj-flooring.com
Halifax, NS B3N 1L3, Canada
